title: Made a purchasing mistake...
body: I accidentaly bought guardian of the sands skarner instead of sandscourge skarner when trying to buy it during an ARAM champion screen..  Could a Rioter please please refund it for me, or exchange it for sandscourge? My summoner name is "Ahri Safari" on NA server. I really hope this can be resolved, it was an honest mistake.. Thank you to anyone that can help in advance.

replies.body: Hit up those billing agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if they can still get this refunded for you! Usually, if you write in quick enough and we can tell on our end it was a simple mistake, we should be able to get that done.
Thank you! Made this forum thread before I went to bed so I didn't see this, but I set the ticket up now. Now just have to hope!

Hi!! 

You can access your refunds by heading to the store and clicking on the "Account" option. From there, head over to your "Purchase History" and check to see have many refunds you have available.

Hope this helps. If you still have issues after following my instructions, don't hesitate to reply to this comment.

{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
I know, thank you.. I stupidly used my refund tokens back in 2015. But thank yoiu so much for responding.
Oh yikes. Be more careful next time!
Thankfully, they granted my refund, but told me it's just a one time thing. Thank you all for helping! Have a great day/evening! I suppose the thread can be locked or deleted now, however that works.
